comments.html:
Well,

I got two IBM servers, IBM DS3400 storage and VMware on top of it.

Zero experience and still was able to install and configure all of it. I know that an experienced guy will find a few design mistakes!

I love Vmotion :)

I will get an UCS 200 in a few weeks, can't wait.
comments.name: Smail

comments.html:
Nice! Without DNS, you may be able to get things working by adding records into /etc/hosts. Or maybe you can download a virtual appliance to run DNS for you...

http://www.vmware.com/appliances/directory/797
